Primary Contact: Alana Turigan, Language Instruction for New Canadians Coordinator; Phone: 250.763.4905 ext 217 * 250.859.5025
Primary Executive: Edna Terbasket, Executive Director; Email: executivedirector@kfs.bc.ca
Service Details: - Operates four English Language Instruction Classes at eight levels to help immigrants to settle in Canada- LINC classes help students speak and understand English for day-to-day life, obtain job skills, learn about Canadian life, Aboriginal culture, laws, health care, and to obtain their language requirements for citizenship- This program includes volunteering in the community, and field-trips within the Okanagan Valley
How to Apply: - Please contact Alana Turigan- Appointments are available Mon-Fri: 1:00pm - 4:00pm
